downloadTitle: Microsoft Project and SharePoint Server 2010 — Better Together
downloadDescription: A white paper for stakeholders in a program ecosystem

downloadFile.name: Project Server and SharePoint 2010 Better Together.docx

detailsSection: This white paper is written with the end user in mind. It will highlight the new features in Project Server 2010 and how this tool has evolved into a must-have requirement for Project Management. You will see capabilities in this release that you have been wanting, hoping for and most likely haven’t even thought of. Plus with Microsoft tethering Project to their shining star, SharePoint, it has created the most significant Project release of the decade.
detailsSection_file_name: Project Server and SharePoint 2010 Better Together.docx
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this paper, you must have Microsoft Office Word 2007. You can also use Office Word 2003 or Word XP and the Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
